verses.verse: <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> there is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G3874>encouragement<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G3890>consolation<s%> of <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there is <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G4698>affection<s%> and <S%G3628>compassion,<s%>

<S%G4137>make<s%> my <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G4137>complete<s%> by being of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind,<s%> <S%G2192>maintaining<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G4861>united<s%> in <S%G4861>spirit,<s%> <S%G5426>intent<s%> on <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5426>purpose.<s%>

Do <S%G3367>nothing<s%> from <S%G2052>selfishness<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> <S%G2754>empty<s%> <S%G2754>conceit,<s%> but with <S%G5012>humility<s%> of <S%G5012>mind<s%> let <S%G240>each<s%> of you <S%G2233>regard<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> as <S%G5242>more<s%> <S%G5242>important<s%> than <S%G1438>himself;<s%>
do not [merely] <S%G4648>look<s%> out for your <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1538>personal<s%> interests, but <S%G2532>also<s%> for the interests of <S%G2087>others.<s%>
<S%G5426>Have<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5426>attitude<s%> in <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

<S%G3739>who,<s%> although He <S%G5225>existed<s%> in the <S%G3444>form<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> did not <S%G2233>regard<s%> <S%G2470>equality<s%> with <S%G2316>God<s%> a <S%G725>thing<s%> to be <S%G725>grasped,<s%>
but <S%G2758>emptied<s%> <S%G1438>Himself,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> the <S%G3444>form<s%> of a bond-servant, [and] <S%G1096>being<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> in the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

And being <S%G2147>found<s%> in <S%G4976>appearance<s%> as a <S%G444>man,<s%> He <S%G5013>humbled<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> by <S%G1096>becoming<s%> <S%G5255>obedient<s%> to the <S%G3360>point<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G1161>even<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> on a <S%G4716>cross.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5251>highly<s%> <S%G5251>exalted<s%> Him, and <S%G5483>bestowed<s%> on Him the <S%G3686>name<s%> which is <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%>

that at the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1119>knee<s%> should <S%G2578>bow,<s%> of those who are in <S%G2032>heaven,<s%> and on <S%G1919>earth,<s%> and <S%G2709>under<s%> the <S%G2709>earth,<s%>

and that <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> should <S%G1843>confess<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

<S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G5620>then,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as you have <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G5219>obeyed,<s%> not as in my <S%G3952>presence<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> in my <S%G666>absence,<s%> <S%G2716>work<s%> out your <S%G4991>salvation<s%> with <S%G5401>fear<s%> and <S%G5156>trembling;<s%>
for it is <S%G2316>God<s%> who is at <S%G1754>work<s%> in you, <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G2309>will<s%> and to <S%G1754>work<s%> for [His] <S%G2107>good<s%> <S%G2107>pleasure.<s%>
<S%G4160>Do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G1112>grumbling<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G1261>disputing;<s%>

that you may <S%G1096>prove<s%> yourselves to be <S%G273>blameless<s%> and <S%G185>innocent,<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G299>above<s%> <S%G299>reproach<s%> in the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of a <S%G4646>crooked<s%> and <S%G1294>perverse<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5316>appear<s%> as <S%G5458>lights<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%>

<S%G1907>holding<s%> <S%G1907>fast<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> that in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> I may have <S%G2745>cause<s%> to <S%G2745>glory<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I did not <S%G5143>run<s%> in <S%G2756>vain<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G2872>toil<s%> in <S%G2756>vain.<s%>

But <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I am being <S%G4689>poured<s%> out as a <S%G4689>drink<s%> <S%G4689>offering<s%> upon the <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> and <S%G3009>service<s%> of your <S%G4102>faith,<s%> I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> and <S%G4796>share<s%> my <S%G4796>joy<s%> with you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
And you <S%G2532>too,<s%> [I urge you,] <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G846>way<s%> and <S%G4796>share<s%> your <S%G4796>joy<s%> with me.

But I <S%G1679>hope<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> to you <S%G5030>shortly,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that I <S%G2532>also<s%> may be <S%G2174>encouraged<s%> when I <S%G1097>learn<s%> of your <S%G3588>condition.<s%> <S%G4012><s%>

For I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> [else] of <S%G2473>kindred<s%> <S%G2473>spirit<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> will <S%G1104>genuinely<s%> be <S%G3309>concerned<s%> for your <S%G3588>welfare.<s%>
For they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2212>after<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> interests, not <S%G3588>those<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

But you <S%G1097>know<s%> of his <S%G1382>proven<s%> <S%G1382>worth<s%> that he <S%G1398>served<s%> with me in the furtherance of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G5043>child<s%> [serving] his <S%G3962>father.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> him <S%G1824>immediately,<s%> as soon as I <S%G872>see<s%> <S%G872>how<s%> <S%G3588>things<s%> [go] with me;
and I <S%G3982>trust<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> that I <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> shall be <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G5030>shortly.<s%>

But I <S%G2233>thought<s%> it <S%G316>necessary<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> to you <S%G1891>Epaphroditus,<s%> my <S%G80>brother<s%> and <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>worker<s%> and <S%G4961>fellow<s%> <S%G4961>soldier,<s%> who is <S%G1161>also<s%> your <S%G652>messenger<s%> and <S%G3011>minister<s%> to my <S%G5532>need;<s%>
<S%G1894>because<s%> he was <S%G1971>longing<s%> for you <S%G3956>all<s%> and was <S%G85>distressed<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> you had <S%G191>heard<s%> that he was <S%G770>sick.<s%>

For <S%G2532>indeed<s%> he was <S%G770>sick<s%> to the <S%G3897>point<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1653>had<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on him, and not on him <S%G3441>only<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> on me, <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> upon <S%G3077>sorrow.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> him <S%G4709>all<s%> the <S%G4709>more<s%> <S%G4709>eagerly<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that when you <S%G3708>see<s%> him <S%G3825>again<s%> you may <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> and I may be <S%G253>less<s%> <S%G253>concerned<s%> [about you.]

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G4327>receive<s%> him in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> and <S%G2192>hold<s%> <S%G5108>men<s%> <S%G5108>like<s%> him in <S%G1784>high<s%> <S%G1784>regard;<s%>

<S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G1448>came<s%> <S%G1448>close<s%> to <S%G2288>death<s%> for the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3850>risking<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> to <S%G378>complete<s%> <S%G5303>what<s%> was <S%G5303>deficient<s%> in your <S%G3009>service<s%> to me.
